Storyline

A detective pushed beyond his limits will stop at nothing for vengeance. 
When his wife is killed by a criminal that he put away, Mason, a hard-
nosed detective, deliberately gets arrested in order to get revenge. 
While inside, Mason discovers a new criminal enterprise that those 
behind it would kill to protect.
